message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it's a fantastic deal, what do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $120 is too low for me. Could you do $180?
I understand your position, but $180 is still a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to meet me at $160?
